## camelCase() function

camelCase splits on spaces and capitalizes words in between

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function camelCase(string: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  string | <code>string</code> | string to camelCase |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

camel case version of the string
